web/src/components/machines/ReliabilityD.description: ReliabilityDetailsModal component for displaying machine reliability scores, 30-day uptime history chart, and user rating submission. Follows InstanceDetailsModal pattern with AlertDialog from tailadmin-ui. Uses Redux for rating submission (submitMachineRating thunk). Fetches history from /api/v1/reliability/machines/{id}/history endpoint.

web/src/pages/Machines.jsx.description: Machines page now has reliability sort and filter controls in the header: sort by reliability toggle (Switch), threshold slider (0-100), auto-exclude checkbox, and show all machines toggle that appears when auto-exclude is enabled. Uses local state for sortByReliability, reliabilityThreshold, autoExcludeBelowThreshold, showAllMachines, and reliabilityData.
